trophies.trophyDetail: All trophies have been awarded.
Open your inventory.
Punch a tree until the block of wood pops out.
Craft a workbench with four blocks of wooden planks.
Use planks and sticks to make a pickaxe.
Construct a furnace out of eight cobblestone blocks.
Smelt an iron ingot.
Use planks and sticks to make a hoe.
Turn wheat into bread.
Bake a cake using wheat, sugar, milk and eggs!
Construct a better pickaxe.
Catch and cook a fish!
Travel by minecart to a point at least 500m in a single direction from where you started.
Use planks and sticks to make a sword.
Attack and destroy a monster.
Harvest some leather.
Use a saddle to ride a pig, then have the pig get hurt from fall damage while riding it.
Befriend five wolves.
Construct one type of each tool (one pickaxe, one spade, one axe and one hoe).
Construct a Dispenser.
Construct a Nether Portal.
Kill a skeleton with an arrow from more than 50 meters.
Acquire diamonds with your iron tools.
Destroy a Ghast with a fireball.
Relieve a Blaze of its rod.
Brew a potion.
Enter an End Portal.
Kill the Enderdragon.
Construct an Enchantment Table.
Deal nine hearts of damage in a single hit.
Build some bookshelves to improve your enchantment table.
Discover 17 of 40 biomes.
Breed two cows with wheat.
Throw diamonds at another player.
Cook and eat a pork chop.
Play for 100 days.
Kill a creeper with arrows.
Acquire 30 Emeralds by trading with villagers or mining.
Craft and place a Flower Pot.
Craft and place a sign.
Stop starvation using Rotten Flesh.
Use Shears to obtain wool from a sheep.
Gather all 16 colours of wool.
Swim in lava while having the Fire Resistance effect.
Mine 1,728 Cobblestone and place it in a chest.
Smelt wood trunks using charcoal to make more charcoal.
Play a music disc in a Jukebox.
Create an Iron Golem.
Wear a full suit of Iron armour.
Cure a zombie villager.
Gain the trust of an Ocelot.
Spawn the Wither.
Kill the Wither.
Create and fully power a Beacon.
Eat a Notch Apple.
Dye all 4 unique pieces of Leather Armor.
Bounce 30 blocks upward off a Slime Block.
Win a public Battle mini game. [Editions Only]
Win 3 public Battle mini games in a row. [Editions Only]
Take 100 damage in a round of a public Battle game. [Editions Only]
Kill 2 players in a round of public Battle mini game using a bow and arrow. [Editions Only]
Kill a player while you are starving in a Battle mini game. [Editions Only]
Open every chest in a Battle mini game arena in one round. [Editions Only]
Respawn the Enderdragon.
Collect Dragon's Breath in a Glass Bottle.
Use an Elytra to fly through a 1 by 1 gap while moving faster than 40 m/s.
Dry a Sponge in a Furnace.
Stay underwater for 2 minutes.
Power a Furnace with Lava.
Tame a Horse.
Poison a Witch with a Splash Potion.
Teleport over 100 meters from a single throw of an Ender Pearl.
Place 9 fully explored, adjacent Maps into 9 Item Frames in a 3 by 3 square.
Kill a Mob while wearing the same type of Mob Head.
Win 3 rounds in a row after one of the opponents has won 2 rounds. [Editions Only]
Win a single round of Snowball Tumble without throwing any Snowballs. [Editions Only]
Hit a single Player with 25 Snowballs in a single public round. [Editions Only]
Hit a Player with a Snowball while falling into the Lava. [Editions Only]
Push three Players into Lava using Snowballs in a single public round. [Editions Only]
Stay on the top layer while winning a round in a Snowball Tumble Mini Game. [Editions Only]
Win a Tumble game whilst on the lowest layer in a Snowball Tumble Mini Game. [Editions Only]
Defeat an Elder Guardian.
Levitate up 50 block from the attacks of a Shulker.
Dye your bed a different color.
Use the Totem of Undying to cheat death.

trophies.trophyName: So I got that going for me...
trophies.trophyDetail: Lead a caravan containing at least 5 Llamas.
Using the Frost Walker boots, walk on at least 1 block on frozen water on a deep ocean.
Defeat an Evoker.

trophies.trophyName: One Pickle, Two Pickle, Sea Pickle, Four
trophies.trophyDetail: Place four Sea Pickles in one block.
Use a Dried Kelp block as fuel in a furnace.
Activate a Conduit.
Eat nothing but Kelp for 3 days.
Stay underwater for one full day without using potions.
Feed a dolphin raw cod and have it lure you to treasure.
Use Riptide to give yourself a boost.
Collect any fish in a bucket.
Discover a Shipwreck.
Build a tower of Scaffolding that reaches the maximum build height.
Receive a gift in the morning from a tamed Cat.
Breed two Pandas with Bamboo.
Find an underwater ruin.
Name a Shulker Box with an Anvil.
Craft a Banner using an Enchanted Apple.
Befriend twenty stray Cats.
Visit all Ocean Biomes.
Trade for the best possible price.
Use a Grindstone to get experience from an enchanted item.

trophies.trophyName: I've got a bad feeling about this
trophies.trophyDetail: Kill a Pillager Captain.
Defeat a Ravager.
Ring the bell with a hostile enemy in the village.
Trigger a Pillager Raid.
Use a hopper to move an item from a chest minecart to a chest. [Bedrock Only]
Connect three chests to a single furnace using three hoppers. [Bedrock Only]
Push a piston with a piston, then pull the original piston with that piston. [Bedrock Only]
Breed a mule from a horse and a donkey. [Bedrock Only]
Cook and eat rabbit meat. [Bedrock Only]
Buy an Ocean Explorer or Woodland Explorer map from a villager, then enter the revealed structure. [Bedrock Only]
Dig up a buried treasure. [Bedrock Only]
Trade for 1,000 Emeralds. [Bedrock Only]
Give someone a suspicious stew. [Bedrock Only]
Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees. [Bedrock Only]
Move and place a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch. [Bedrock Only]
Slide down a honey block to slow your fall. [Bedrock Only]
Hit the bullseye of a Target block [Bedrock Only]
Wear a full set of Netherite armor [Bedrock Only]
Distract a Piglin using gold [Bedrock Only]
Visit all Nether biomes [Bedrock Only]
